p: Because of the vast variations of numismatic figures of silphion plant, comparison of the morphological features of Ferula drudeana beyond the aforementioned characters may not be accurate. Some authors believe that some of the silphion numismatic figures do not reflect the real representation of source plant but simply serve as an exaggerated advertisement [ 29]. For example, a typical advertising numismatic figure of silphion plant often appears as a phallic representation on Cyrenaic coins ( Figure 6).
